http://gameinfocenter.com/pc-games/system-requirements/Prototype-2.html

Minimum system requirements

* OS: Windows XP, Vista or Windows 7
* CPU: Intel Core 2 Duo @ 2.66 GHz or similar AMD
* RAM: 2 GB
* VGA: nVidia GeForce 8800 / ATI Radeon HD 2900
* HDD: 10 GB free disk space
* Graphics: 512 MB Graphics Memory
* Sound Card: DirectX 9 Compatible

Recommended system requirements

* OS: Windows XP, Vista or Windows 7
* CPU: Intel Core 2 Duo @ 3.0 GHz or similar AMD
* RAM: 3 GB
* VGA: GeForce GT 440 or Radeon HD 3800 series
* HDD: 10 GB free disk space
* Graphics: 1 GB Graphics Memory

This works!!!

 PainkilleR.99 at 2012-08-15 17:21 CET:
I found a solution to the memory leak of Prototype 2 !! if you have ATI Radeon graphic card download a software called Ati Tray tools install it then go to the 3D category you should find "Flip Queue Size" and set it to 1, if you have Nvidia then simply go to the control panel look for "Pre Rendered Frames" and set it to 1 !! i tried it and it works fine now exept for some loss of FPS but the game is still playable
